name: Obscurio
description:
Obscurio is a puzzle solving 2D platformer with a dark fairy tale theme.

You will travel through different fairy tales and attempt to solve mini-games to help escape from the world you are trapped in.

This was created as a final year university project involving both artists and coders from different courses.

Created By:

Artists

Charlie Grace

Chloe Smith

Coders

Paul Constable

Matthew Rose
